Screen-sharing extension for nuWeb

NuScreen Sharing extension enables to show your screen in video calls. 

The extension makes an integral part of nuWeb messaging application and enables sharing your screen with other nuWeb users during a video call. 

Start a video call with other nuWeb users and let them see your screen when necessary.
